# skim
```{r, echo=FALSE}
stats <- skimr:::.default
stats$numeric$skew <- e1071::skewness
skimr::skim_with(.list = stats)

all %>% skimr::skim()
all %>% dplyr::group_by(df_name) %>% skimr::skim()
```
